arts.ttl: Michael Carrick's comments about Liverpool loanee Ben Doak speak volumes after full debut
arts.sum: The 18-year-old ensured it was a first start to remember with the opening goal in Middlesbrough's victory over Stoke

arts.ttl: Ben Doak scores first Middlesbrough goal in win over Stoke
Middlesbrough bank an important win with a mood-boosting performance to boot against Stoke City
arts.sum: Doak was handed his full Boro debut and marked with a man-of-the-match performance that included his first goal for the club to put Boro ahead. Previously guilty of not being ruthless enough to kill games off, Hayden Hackney then wrapped it up for Boro in style in the second half, with a stunning finish to ensure Boro picked up an important three points.

arts.ttl: Middlesbrough vs Stoke City live - Team news as Narcis Pelach hunts first points - Stoke-on-Trent Live
arts.sum: It has been a busy week on the training ground laying out the new demands and expectations in hope that Stoke can bounce back from a 3-1 home reverse to Hull City last time out. Sam Gallagher has returned from calf injury to take his place in the Stoke squad for the first time since joining from Blackburn Rovers in the summer and Andrew Moran is back from illness.

arts.ttl: Ben Gibson to fittingly reach career milestone at Middlesbrough stirring up nostalgic memories
arts.sum: The next time Ben Gibson plays it will mark the career milestone of 400 club games. Almost certain to play for Stoke City against Middlesbrough this afternoon, it feels rather fitting he'll achieve that feat at the Riverside.

arts.ttl: First start for Doak: Middesbrough team news and predicted XI to face Stoke City
arts.sum: The latest Middlesbrough team news as Michael Carrick’s gear up to face Stoke City in the Championship. The post First start for Doak: Middesbrough team news and predicted XI to face Stoke City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: 'I couldn't be more convinced Narcis Pelach is the manager to turn Stoke City around'
arts.sum: There is still obviously loads to improve and there always will be but I’m really confident that we’ve got the group to do it and we just have to ride out the periods when it maybe hasn’t worked as well and maximise our chances that our new shape and structure can give us.” There was a difficult move to Burnley when he had seemed on the cusp of an international breakthrough but he was revitalised at Norwich, where he met coach Narcis Pelach last year as they reached the play-offs, before heading to Stoke to be pretty quickly joined by Pelach as his new boss, replacing Steven Schumacher last week.

arts.ttl: Middlesbrough's Stoke City challenge thanks to new boss and Michael Carrick's plan
arts.sum: Michael Carrick will try and gain as much as he possibly can from Narcis Pelach's one game in charge of Stoke City, but will otherwise be relying on his Middlesbrough players to play their own game and adapt to whatever challenges are put in front of them on the day. One thing Boro do know is that Stoke, despite their disappointing start to the new season, do have quality players - particularly in attack.

arts.ttl: Stoke City boss, the Jose Mourinho playbook, quick fixes and major challenges
arts.sum: If you don’t have the forward player doing that, it’s a hell of a lot of work when you’re defending deep. From the start against Hull you could see that Stoke had done work on pressing when the opposition had the ball in their defensive third.

arts.ttl: Michael Carrick considers ringing the changes for misfiring Middlesbrough against Stoke City
arts.sum: With Boro struggling in attack as much as they have been, however, with only one league goal scored in open play in their first six games, there have also been calls for a more drastic formation or stylistic change. Carrick has always said that the size of his Boro squad would be no option.
